system.description: When surrounded by multiple enemies, the character becomes a whirlwind of death, striking at all foes within reach.
system.benefit: When the Character attacks whilst surrounded by more than one foe in close combat, they can make one free melee attack against a number of surrounding foes up to the character's Weapon Skill Bonus. Each additional attack counts as a Free Action and cannot be combined with any other talents or abilities that would grant further extra attacks (such as Lightning Attack, Furious Assault, etc). The Character can choose the order in which they attack their opponents. Against hordes, their attacks deal additional damage to the Horde's Magnitude equal to half their Weapon Skill Bonus.

specialAbilities.name: Multi-Target Melee
specialAbilities.description: When surrounded, make free melee attacks against up to WS Bonus foes. Against hordes, deal additional magnitude damage equal to half your WS Bonus.
